column1: #Text=Mako says : " We have to find a way out of here before Zaheer gets his hands on Korra . "
#Text=" Prisoner says : " The first few months were great , I - I could finally get some sleep , but ... now I really miss them .
#Text=" Prisoner says : " I believe in you too , Bolin .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I appreciate that , Mako , and fellow ... prisoner man .
#Text=But I 've been trying and trying and trying and I 've never been able to do it .
#Text=" Mako says : " You 've always had the ability deep down .
#Text=You just have n't had the motivation .
#Text=Get us out of here to save Korra .
#Text=" Prisoner says : " Hey , you guys did n't happen to bring any toilet paper , do you ?
